00010 OROrcaRequestDecoder::OROrcaRequestDecoder() { fDataRecord = NULL; }
00011         
00012 bool OROrcaRequestDecoder::ParseDataRecord(UInt_t* dataRecord) 
00013 {
00014   fDataRecord = dataRecord;
00015 
00016   ORLog(kDebug) << "ParseDataRecord(): Parsing the data record..." << std::endl;
00017   if (LengthOf(fDataRecord) - kBufferLength <=0) {
00018     ORLog(kWarning) << "Record length of 0." << std::endl;
00019     return false;
00020   }
00021   if (!fXMLRecord.LoadXmlPlist((char*) (fDataRecord + kBufferLength),
00022      sizeof(UInt_t)*(LengthOf(fDataRecord)-kBufferLength))) {
00023     ORLog(kError) << "Error parsing data record..." << std::endl;
00024     return false;
00025   }
00026 
00027   /* Getting XML Values */
00028   // Getting Tag Number
00029   ORLog(kDebug) << "ParseDataRecord(): Getting the Request Tag Number..." << std::endl;
00030   const ORDictValueI* reqTagPtr = 
00031     dynamic_cast<const ORDictValueI*>(fXMLRecord.LookUp("Request Tag Number"));
00032   if(!reqTagPtr) {
00033     ORLog(kError) << "Error getting Request Tag Number. " << std::endl;
00034     return false;
00035   }
00036   fRequestTagNumber = reqTagPtr->GetI();
00037 
00038   // Getting Request Type 
00039   ORLog(kDebug) << "ParseDataRecord(): Getting the Request Type..." << std::endl;
00040   const ORDictValueS* reqTypePtr = 
00041     dynamic_cast<const ORDictValueS*>(fXMLRecord.LookUp("Request Type"));
00042   if(!reqTypePtr) {
00043     ORLog(kError) << "Error getting Request Type. " << std::endl;
00044     return false;
00045   }
00046   fRequestType = reqTypePtr->GetS(); 
00047 
00048   // Getting Request Option
00049   
00050   ORLog(kDebug) << "ParseDataRecord(): Getting the Request Option..." << std::endl;
00051   const ORDictValueS* reqOptionPtr = 
00052     dynamic_cast<const ORDictValueS*>(fXMLRecord.LookUp("Request Option"));
00053   if(!reqOptionPtr) {
00054     ORLog(kError) << "Error getting Request Option. " << std::endl;
00055     return false;
00056   }
00057   fRequestOption = reqOptionPtr->GetS(); 
00058 
00059 
00060   // Getting Inputs
00061   ORLog(kDebug) << "ParseDataRecord(): Getting the Request Inputs..." << std::endl;
00062   fRequestInputs = dynamic_cast<const ORDictionary*>(fXMLRecord.LookUp("Request Inputs")); 
00063   if(!fRequestInputs) {
00064     ORLog(kError) << "Error getting Request Inputs. " << std::endl;
00065     return false;
00066   }
00067 
00068   ORLog(kDebug) << "ParseDataRecord(): Exiting" << std::endl;
00069   return true;
00070 }
